sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
To the most honourable assembly of knights, citizens, and burgesses of the House of Parliament the humble petition of the adventurers in the ship called the Pearle. Pearle (Ship) England and Wales. Parliament.
1 broadside.
s.n., [London : 1621?]
A complaint that they have been deprived of their goods or the value thereof since April 1615.--Cf. (2nd ed.) Place and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.). Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library (London, England).
=======
